message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $130.  I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'd love to hear your thoughts on that.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I'm close to accepting, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'd love to hear your thoughts on that.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair with my pricing.  $120 is the absolute lowest I can go.
